timeline.message: filter out results when the assessment due date is not over
override for programming exercises, show only manual result when assessment due date is passed or null, else show automatic result

add check for manual assessment for programming exercises
remove manual result button from scores page after assessment due date
add warning when assessment due date is over
fix failing tests and run spotless
Merge branch 'develop' of https://github.com/ls1intum/Artemis into bugfix/hide-manual-assessment-draft
